metadata.title: CVE-2013-4347 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The (1) make_nonce, (2) generate_nonce, and (3) generate_verifier functionsin SimpleGeo python-oauth2 uses weak random numbers to generate nonces,which makes it easier for remote attackers to guess the nonce via a bruteforce attack.

criterions.comment: python-oauth2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
